*`==` v0.1 (2010-10-07) `==`*

 * Usage:
  * `python proxyshark.py -h`
 * Packet capture using Nfqueue:
  * Netfilter rules must be written manually
   * `iptables -I OUTPUT 1 -d 1.2.3.4 -p tcp --dport 80 -j NFQUEUE --queue-num 0`
   * `iptables -I INPUT 1 -s 1.2.3.4 -p tcp --sport 80 -j NFQUEUE --queue-num 0`
  * Packets can be accepted or dropped
  * Packets are read-only
  * Packets are printed to stdout by default
 * Packet dissection using TShark:
  * You must iterate over all the protocols and fields to find a given item...
 * No GUI
